heading: Get 15% discount using SBI Credit Cards
para: Maximum discount up to ₹100 on orders above ₹500

term.1: Applicable once per user during the offer period
term.2: Valid on all SBI Credit Cards except Corporate, Paytm & Cashback SBI Card

heading: Get flat ₹125 discount using American Express Cards

term.2: Applicable once per user per week
term.3: Valid only on American Express Consumer and Network Cards
term.4: Not applicable on American Express Corporate Cards

heading: Get 20% discount using Kotak Bank Debit Cards
para: Maximum discount up to ₹125 on orders above ₹500

term.2: Applicable once per user per month
term.3: Valid only on Kotak Bank Debit Cards

heading: Get flat ₹125 discount using American Express Cards

term.2: Applicable once per user per week
term.3: Valid only on American Express Consumer and Network Cards
term.4: Not applicable on American Express Corporate Cards
